findings.title: Solidity version must be fixed (Always use latest Version)
findings.description: The solidity version should be fixed to ensure consistency between development and deployment phases.

findings.title: Use safe math library operation at all places
findings.description: In the transferFrom() function, safe math operation is not used to subtract allowance.

findings.title: Token Name Mismatch
findings.description: The token name in the smart contract ('MM Moon Money') contradicts with the token name in the documentation ('Moon Money Chain').
